value.title: Capture feedback and monitoring data to continuously improve your software
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms
topItems.excerpt: Learn how surveys and application analytics create a feedback loop that helps you understand the voice of the customer.

topItems.title: Route system feedback to development teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

topItems.title: Manage site reliability
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: Protect public sector data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn to design conceptual architecture for data classifications using data residency for Microsoft 365 and Dynamics 365 services while utilizing Azure regions and Customer lockbox. Manage breach notifications in Service Trust Portal and Azure Security Center. And encrypt data throughout its lifecycle.

topItems.title: Design cloud solutions for the public sector
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to the stakes and options for implementing Azure to safeguard public sector data.

topItems.title: Encrypt public sector data in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Overview of the options available for managing encryption keys and encrypting data throughout its lifecycle, with special attention to public sector.

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

value.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

value.title: Architect full-stack applications and automate deployments with GitHub
value.excerpt: In the language of your choice (Node.js, Python, or .NET), deploy an end-to-end solution to solve the real-world scenario of catching the bus. You'll learn how to architect a solution that uses Azure SQL Database, Azure Functions, Azure Static Web Apps, Logic Apps, Visual Studio Code, and GitHub Actions.

value.title: Automate DevOps processes by using GitHub Apps
value.excerpt: Learn to automate DevOps processes by using GitHub Apps that handle repetitive tasks, enforce team policies, and maintain a tidy repository.

value.title: Ensure stable operations and optimization across all supported workloads deployed to the cloud.
value.excerpt: As workloads are deployed to the cloud, operations is critical to success.

value.title: Prepare for successful cloud adoption with a well-defined strategy
value.excerpt: Success in cloud adoption is predicated by a clear strategy that helps the team understand executive direction and regularly measure progress. This module will help capture the cloud adoption strategy needed to drive your success.

value.title: Define the foundation pillars of DevOps: Architecture and Technology
value.excerpt: There are three things required to make DevOps happen: the cultural component, tools and technology, and architecture. Discover the last two foundation pillars of DevOps, Architecture and Technology!

value.title: Automate Azure Functions deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for Azure Functions.

value.title: Automate Docker container deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for Docker containers.

value.title: Rapidly develop and deploy Java apps using GitHub Actions
value.excerpt: Create a Terraform configuration, provision your Azure resources, and set up your project for Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD) with GitHub Actions.

value.title: Automate Java container deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for Java containers.

value.title: Automate multi-container Kubernetes deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for multiple containers to Kubernetes.

value.title: Automate Node.js deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement CI/CD pipeline for Node.js applications. Automate deployment of Vue, React, Angular or webpack apps with Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Automate Python deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for Python.

value.title: Explore DevOps Continuous Security and Continuous Operations
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Security and Continuous Operations.

value.title: Implement change tracking and file integrity monitoring for Windows IaaS VMs
value.excerpt: Implement change tracking and file integrity monitoring for Windows IaaS VMs

value.title: Introduction to Azure DevTest Labs
value.excerpt: Evaluate whether Azure DevTest Labs is appropriate for setting up virtual machine environments for your team.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Monitor
value.excerpt: Learn what Azure Monitor is and where you would use it.

value.title: Load test Azure web apps by using Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Discover Azure portal and Azure DevOps tools that help you quickly and efficiently define and scale up load tests for apps.

value.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Use a release approval in Azure Pipelines to help coordinate database schema changes between developers and database administrators.

value.title: Manage release cadence in Azure Pipelines by using deployment patterns
value.excerpt: Choose and implement a deployment pattern that helps you smoothly roll out new application features to your users.

value.title: Instrument a cloud-native ASP.NET Core microservice
value.excerpt: This module guides you through implementing logging and monitoring in an ASP.NET Core microservices app in Azure Kubernetes Service.

value.title: Monitor and report on security events in Azure AD
value.excerpt: Keep tabs on security events in your Azure AD resources by using built-in reporting and monitoring capabilities. Respond to events as they happen, and address security risks before they become a problem.

value.title: Monitor performance of virtual machines by using Azure Monitor for VMs
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Monitor for VMs to monitor your organization's Azure virtual machines.

value.title: Persist and retrieve relational data with Entity Framework Core
value.excerpt: This module guides you through creating a data access project, connecting to a relational database, and writing CRUD queries.

value.title: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Provision infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Learn how infrastructure as code enables you to describe and automatically provision the infrastructure that you need for your application.

value.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms
value.excerpt: Learn how surveys and application analytics create a feedback loop that helps you understand the voice of the customer.
